content: size 16 x 9 5 cm 6 3 x 3 7 inches sometimes i don´t want to carry a whole purse or bag when i´m going out on these occasions it´s perfect to have a small phone bag i want to share this pretty simple pattern so you can make one for your self or why not a present for someone you like do you want to make the bag in one colour or many colours only you can decide you will need totally 1 skein 50 g for one bag yarn used sceepjes catona i also want to recommend favoritgarners new yarn fika i hope you will enjoy the pattern
